room_title: Escape room "Pirate Ship" by The Escape Room in Winston-Salem
room_address: 3191 Peters Creek Parkway Winston Salem, NC 27127
room_description:
Your ship has been commandeered, and you and your crewmates have been captured by pirates!  Having been at sea for many days, the pirates decided to anchor near shore to fetch supplies, leaving you alone on the ship. To keep you from escaping, the pirates have created many steps to unlocking the ships doors.
You and your crew have one hour to disable the ship's lock system and escape the pirate's ship in order to survive!
